Name: Toy - Fairy Stick
Description:
After using the prop, the normal attack button is replaced with the fairy wand waving button.
Click the button to wave the fairy wand in place, click the button again to stop. Click the exit toy button to restore the normal attack button.
Description$english:
After using the prop, the normal attack button is replaced with the fairy wand waving button.
Click the button to wave the fairy wand in place, click the button again to stop. Click the exit toy button to restore the normal attack button.
